test.name: Le Lien De Connexion Devrait Etre Visible Après Une Déconnexion Réussie

kw.name: Ouvrir Le Navigateur Et Accéder A La Page d'Accueil
Open Browser
kw.msg: The chromedriver version (142.0.7444.175) detected in PATH at C:\chromedriver-win64\chromedriver-win64\chromedriver.exe might not be compatible with the detected chrome version (143.0.7499.170); currently, chromedriver 143.0.7499.169 is recommended for chrome 143.*, so it is advised to delete the driver in PATH and retry
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Accéder A La Page De Connexion
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Vérifiez Que Le Tableau De Bord Est Visible
Wait Until Element Is Not Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is not visible.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.msg: Page title is 'Tableau de bord - Livraison 3'.
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Effectuer Une Déconnexion Réussie
Click Link
